scripts.dev: npm run dev --prefix frontend & env DJANGO_SETTINGS_MODULE=django_react.settings_dev python3 manage.py runserver 0.0.0.0:8000
scripts.dev-win: npm run dev --prefix frontend & set DJANGO_SETTINGS_MODULE=django_react.settings_dev&& python3 manage.py runserver 0.0.0.0:8000
scripts.prod: npm run prod --prefix frontend & python3 manage.py runserver
scripts.migrate: env DJANGO_SETTINGS_MODULE=django_react.settings_dev python3 manage.py makemigrations app && env DJANGO_SETTINGS_MODULE=django_react.settings_dev python3 manage.py migrate
